name: SolutionStatus
description: Represents the status of a solution.
summary:
The `SolutionStatus` object in the Salesforce application is used to manage and track the status of solutions. It includes the following attributes:

1. **Id (type: id)**: A unique identifier for each solution status.
2. **MasterLabel (type: string)**: A descriptive label for the solution status.
3. **ApiName (type: string)**: The API name used to reference the solution status in code.
4. **SortOrder (type: int)**: An integer value that determines the order of the status in lists.
5. **IsDefault (type: boolean)**: A boolean flag indicating whether this status is the default status.
6. **IsReviewed (type: boolean)**: A boolean flag indicating whether the solution status has been reviewed.
7. **CreatedById (type: reference)**: A reference to the user who created the solution status.
8. **CreatedDate (type: datetime)**: The date and time when the solution status was created.
9. **LastModifiedById (type: reference)**: A reference to the user who last modified the solution status.
10. **LastModifiedDate (type: datetime)**: The date and time when the solution status was last modified.
11. **SystemModstamp (type: datetime)**: A system-generated timestamp indicating the last time the solution status was modified by any automated process.

These attributes collectively help in managing and organizing solution statuses within the Salesforce platform.
label: Solution Status Value
